info.title: GopherMaps API
info.summary: REST API for the GopherMaps Project

get.description: Get all the buildings in a given area

parameters.name: area

schema.description: The label name of the requested area

parameters.description: The label name of the requested area

get.description: Get the destinations reachable from a given building

parameters.name: building

schema.description: The name of the building whose destinations are being queried
schema.title: Building

parameters.description: The name of the building whose destinations are being queried

get.description: Get a route between two buildings, a list of the buildings along the route, and their associated thumbnails

parameters.name: start

schema.description: The navID of the start building's BuildingKey node
schema.title: Start

parameters.description: The navID of the start building's BuildingKey node

parameters.name: end

schema.description: The navID of the end building's BuildingKey node
schema.title: End

parameters.description: The navID of the end building's BuildingKey node

thumbnail.title: Thumbnail
thumbnail.description: The filename of the area's thumbnail image

thumbnail.title: Thumbnail
thumbnail.description: The filename of the building's thumbnail image

keyID.title: Keyid
keyID.description: The navID of the building's BuildingKey node

buildingName.title: Buildingname
buildingName.description: The name of the building the node belongs to

floor.title: Floor
floor.description: The floor in the building this navigation node is in

navID.title: Navid
navID.description: The navID of the Neo4j node the model represents

image.title: Image
image.description: The reference image for the navigation node

NavigationNodeModel.title: NavigationNodeModel
NavigationNodeModel.description: Represents a single "step" of a navigation route
